backend/main.mo: Core backend canister with user profiles, admin-gated product CRUD, and user-gated order creation and retrieval using AccessControl.
backend/migration.mo: Placeholder migration module that returns state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components with test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining color tokens, themes, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and global providers including theming and toasts.
Simple component rendering the VUURIX logo image.
frontend/src/components/design/Price.tsx: Formats bigint price values into USD currency strings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout with header, main outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Page footer with branding, links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, cart icon, mobile menu, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product card with image, category, name, price, and navigates to the product page on click.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductIma: Renders a product image with a fallback placeholder based on a hash and handles image load errors.
frontend/src/components/store/QuantityCo: Shows increment/decrement buttons with limits to adjust a numeric quantity.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Displays an error alert with a message and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/LoadingSt: Shows a centered loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useAddProdu: Mutation hook to add a product via the actor and refresh the product list with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateOr: Mutation hook to create an order and invalidate the orders query.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useDeletePr: Mutation hook to delete a product and refresh the product list with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useUpdatePr: Mutation hook to update a product and refresh the product list with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useIsCallerAd: Checks if the current actor identity is an admin with caching and no retries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrder.ts: Fetches a single order by ID using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProduct.ts: Fetches a single product by ID with caching and staleâ€‘time settings.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProducts.t: Fetches the full product list using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, state management, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting products with forms, dialogs, and product list management.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, removal, and a summary, showing an empty state when no items exist.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles order creation with form validation, authentication checks, and cart submission, showing login and empty-cart states as needed.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders a hero banner and featured products with loading and error states, linking users to the shop.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order details and totals after purchase, with loading/error states and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays product details with size/color selectors, quantity, and add-to-cart handling with validation.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Lists all products with category filtering, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, update, total, and count utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, layout settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing VUURIX features, versions, and metadata for build tracking.
